snippet.title: Sludge Life 2 - Official Release Date and Demo Trailer | Devolver Digital Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Sludge Life 2 will be available on PC on June 27, 2023, and a demo is available now on Steam. Check out the latest trailer to see gameplay and dive into the world of this first-person vandalism sim sequel. In Sludge Life 2, help Big Mud rediscover his mojo by exploring his recording studio, interacting with idiots, uncovering secrets, and photographing cats.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming
